title: Define Core Requirements
description: Develop a comprehensive list of the platform's core functionalities and features.

title: Design Real-time Collaboration Mechanism
description: Develop a mechanism that allows multiple users to collaborate in real-time with minimal lag and conflict.

title: Implement Version Control System
description: Develop a robust version control system to manage document versions effectively.

title: Develop Conflict Resolution Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm that resolves conflicts arising from simultaneous edits.

title: Develop User Interface for Collaborative Editing
description: Design a user-friendly interface that enables seamless collaboration.

title: Develop Backend Infrastructure for Real-time Updates
description: Create the backend infrastructure required to handle real-time updates.

title: Set Up Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) Pipeline
description: Create a CI/CD pipeline to streamline the development and deployment process.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Conduct a thorough security audit to ensure the platform is secure and compliant.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Collaborative Editing
Develop Backend Infrastructure for Real-time Updates

title: Create Comprehensive Technical Documentation for RealTimeCollaborativeEditingPlatform
description: The technical documentation for the platform should include detailed information on the architecture, features, and usage of the RealTimeCollaborativeEditingPlatform. It should also cover integration with existing systems, troubleshooting guide, best practices, and practical examples. The documentation should be structured in a user-friendly manner, with clear sections for each topic.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Collaborative Editing
Develop Backend Infrastructure for Real-time Updates
